title: Kamala Harris Unveils $50 Million "Fearless" Ad Campaign Against Trump
content: Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris launched a $50 million advertising blitz on Tuesday, capitalizing on the momentum of a fledgling campaign against Republican rival Donald Trump with a one-minute spot titled "Fearless."
summary: Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris launched a $50 million advertising blitz on Tuesday, capitalizing on the momentum of a fledgling campaign against Republican rival Donald Trump with a one-minute spot titled "Fearless."

title: Spanish Actor's Son Jailed For Life For Brutal Murder Of Plastic Surgeon
content: Sancho was found guilty of premeditated murder, concealing a corpse, and destroying property.
summary: Sancho was found guilty of premeditated murder, concealing a corpse, and destroying property.

title: Hong Kong Pro-Democracy News Outlet, Editors Found Guilty Of Sedition
content: Hong Kong pro-democracy news outlet Stand News and its two former chief editors were found guilty of sedition on Thursday, the first conviction of its kind since the city came under Chinese rule in 1997.
summary: Hong Kong pro-democracy news outlet Stand News and its two former chief editors were found guilty of sedition on Thursday, the first conviction of its kind since the city came under Chinese rule in 1997.

title: Oscar-Winner Blasts Trump's "Mean, Inhumane" Treatment Of Migrant Children
content: Film legend Errol Morris said the separation of thousands of migrant children from their parents by Donald Trump's US administration was "inhumane and cruel" as his new documentary about the policy premiered at the Venice Film Festival Thursday.
summary: Film legend Errol Morris said the separation of thousands of migrant children from their parents by Donald Trump's US administration was "inhumane and cruel" as his new documentary about the policy premiered at the Venice Film Festival Thursday.

title: Massive Sinkhole Opens Up In Seoul, Swallows SUV With 2 People Inside
content: Dramatic photos from the scene revealed a white sport utility vehicle almost entirely swallowed by a massive sinkhole.
summary: Dramatic photos from the scene revealed a white sport utility vehicle almost entirely swallowed by a massive sinkhole.

title: Coastal Cities "Not Doing Enough" To Adapt To Climate Change, Study Shows
content: Coastal cities are not doing enough to adapt to climate change, taking too long and implementing insufficient measures, according to a major study published this week.
summary: Coastal cities are not doing enough to adapt to climate change, taking too long and implementing insufficient measures, according to a major study published this week.

title: Kremlin Warns France Against "Political Persecution" Of Telegram Founder
content: The Kremlin warned France on Thursday not to turn a criminal case against Telegram founder Pavel Durov into "political persecution."
summary: The Kremlin warned France on Thursday not to turn a criminal case against Telegram founder Pavel Durov into "political persecution."

title: This Indian City Overtakes Beijing To Become 'Billionaire Capital Of Asia'
content: India's financial capital Mumbai has emerged as the "billionaire capital of Asia," having more billionaires than Beijing, the capital of China, according to the 2024 Hurun India Rich List.
summary: India's financial capital Mumbai has emerged as the "billionaire capital of Asia," having more billionaires than Beijing, the capital of China, according to the 2024 Hurun India Rich List.

title: 'SuperTrump' And 'Crypto President': Donald Trump Launches Digital Cards
content: Trump's latest move follows his promotion of an "official" cryptocurrency project, as the crypto industry faces increased regulatory scrutiny.
summary: Trump's latest move follows his promotion of an "official" cryptocurrency project, as the crypto industry faces increased regulatory scrutiny.

title: Kamala Harris' Edge Over Trump With Boost From Women,  Hispanics: Report
content: Democrat Kamala Harris leads Republican Donald Trump 45% to 41% in a Reuters/Ipsos poll published on Thursday that showed the vice president sparking new enthusiasm among voters and shaking up the race ahead of the Nov. 5 election.
summary: Democrat Kamala Harris leads Republican Donald Trump 45% to 41% in a Reuters/Ipsos poll published on Thursday that showed the vice president sparking new enthusiasm among voters and shaking up the race ahead of the Nov. 5 election.

title: Much Of South Korea's Climate Goals "Unconstitutional", Rules Court
content: South Korea's Constitutional Court ruled Thursday that much of the country's climate goals were unconstitutional, handing a landmark victory to young environmental activists, who wept for joy on the court steps.
summary: South Korea's Constitutional Court ruled Thursday that much of the country's climate goals were unconstitutional, handing a landmark victory to young environmental activists, who wept for joy on the court steps.

title: PM Modi Formally Invited By Pakistan For Regional SCO Meet In October
content: Pakistan today formally announced that Prime Minister Narendra Modi has been invited to the upcoming Shanghai Cooperation Organisation (SCO) meeting being held in Islamabad in mid-October.
summary: Pakistan today formally announced that Prime Minister Narendra Modi has been invited to the upcoming Shanghai Cooperation Organisation (SCO) meeting being held in Islamabad in mid-October.

title: Israeli Troops Kill 5 Palestinian Fighters Hiding Inside West Bank Mosque
content: The Israeli military said on Thursday its troops killed five Palestinian fighters who were hiding inside a mosque in the West Bank city of Tulkarm, in one of the largest assaults on the occupied territory for months.
summary: The Israeli military said on Thursday its troops killed five Palestinian fighters who were hiding inside a mosque in the West Bank city of Tulkarm, in one of the largest assaults on the occupied territory for months.

title: FBI Releases New Pics Of Trump Assassination Bid, Rules Out Foreign Hand
content: United States' Federal Bureau of Investigation or FBI, which is investigating the assassination attempt on Donald Trump at the Republican rally in Pennsylvania last month, has revealed that the gunman Thomas Crooks acted alone.
summary: United States' Federal Bureau of Investigation or FBI, which is investigating the assassination attempt on Donald Trump at the Republican rally in Pennsylvania last month, has revealed that the gunman Thomas Crooks acted alone.

title: Opinion: Crime, Poverty, Fear: Great Britain Is Not So Great Anymore
content: Brexit and then the Covid-19 pandemic led to an upswing in unemployment and pushed scores of communities in the UK below the poverty line.
summary: Brexit and then the Covid-19 pandemic led to an upswing in unemployment and pushed scores of communities in the UK below the poverty line.

title: Why US Political Culture Is Marked By Good Speeches But Bad Debates
content: The recent Democratic National Convention in Chicago was a showcase of impressive speeches.
summary: The recent Democratic National Convention in Chicago was a showcase of impressive speeches.

title: Harris Faces "Major Test" With First Campaign Interview Ahead Of US Polls
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris will give her first interview Thursday since becoming the Democratic standard-bearer, after intense criticism from Republicans that she has been hiding from tough questions.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris will give her first interview Thursday since becoming the Democratic standard-bearer, after intense criticism from Republicans that she has been hiding from tough questions.

title: Kamala Harris Campaign Hires Arab Lawyer For Voter Outreach Amid Gaza War
content: Kamala Harris' campaign for US president has hired an Egyptian American lawyer and former Department of Homeland Security official to help lead outreach to Arab American voters who hold sway in some states that could help decide the Nov. 5 election
summary: Kamala Harris' campaign for US president has hired an Egyptian American lawyer and former Department of Homeland Security official to help lead outreach to Arab American voters who hold sway in some states that could help decide the Nov. 5 election

title: Major Glacial Lake Surveys In Arunachal, Sikkim Areas Bordering China
content: As a part of the national survey to preempt the Glacial Lake Outburst Flood (GLOF), the National Disaster Management Authority (NDMA) has started surveying the Eastern Himalayas to map all glacial lakes in the country.
summary: As a part of the national survey to preempt the Glacial Lake Outburst Flood (GLOF), the National Disaster Management Authority (NDMA) has started surveying the Eastern Himalayas to map all glacial lakes in the country.

title: Nations Building Their Own AI Models Add To Nvidia's Growing Chip Demand
content: Countries adopting their own AI applications and models will contribute about low double-digit billions to Nvidia's revenue in the financial year ending in January 2025, Nvidia forecasts
summary: Countries adopting their own AI applications and models will contribute about low double-digit billions to Nvidia's revenue in the financial year ending in January 2025, Nvidia forecasts
